[93mcompound[0m.
- [93mTris[0m-[93mSilanide[0m [93mf[0m-[93mBlock[0m [93mComplexes[0m: [93mInsights[0m into [93mParamagnetic[0m [93mInfluence[0m on [93mNMR[0m [93mChemical[0m [93mShifts[0m.: The [93mparamagnetism[0m of [93mf[0m-[93mblock[0m [93mions[0m [93mhas[0m been [93mexploited[0m in [93mchiral[0m [93mshift[0m [93mreagents[0m and [93mmagnetic[0m [93mresonance[0m [93mimaging[0m, but these [93mapplications[0m [93mtend[0m to [93mfocus[0m on [93m1[0m [93mH[0m [93mNMR[0m [93mshifts[0m as [93mparamagnetic[0m [93mbroadening[0m [93mmakes[0m [93mless[0m [93msensitive[0m [93mnuclei[0m [93mmore[0m [93mdifficult[0m to [93mstudy[0m. [93mHere[0m [93mwe[0m [93mreport[0m a [93msolution[0m and [93msolid[0m-[93mstate[0m ([93mss[0m) [93m29[0m [93mSi[0m [93mNMR[0m [93mstudy[0m of an [93misostructural[0m [93mseries[0m of [93mlocally[0m [93mD[0m [93m3[0m [93mh[0m -[93msymmetric[0m [93mearly[0m [93mf[0m-[93mblock[0m [93mmetal[0m([93mIII[0m) [93mtris[0m -[93mhypersilanide[0m [93mcomplexes[0m, [[93mM[0m{[93mSi[0m([93mSiMe[0m [93m3[0m ) [93m3[0m } [93m3[0m ([93mTHF[0m) [93m2[0m ] ( [93m1[0m-[93mM[0m ; [93mM[0m = [93mLa[0m, [93mCe[0m, [93mPr[0m, [93mNd[0m, [93mU[0m); [93m1[0m-[93mM[0m were [93malso[0m [93mcharacterized[0m by [93msingle[0m [93mcrystal[0m and [93mpowder[0m [93mX[0m-[93mray[0m [93mdiffraction[0m, [93mEPR[0m, [93mATR[0m-[93mIR[0m, and [93mUV[0m-[93mvis[0m-[93mNIR[0m [93mspectroscopies[0m, [93mSQUID[0m [93mmagnetometry[0m, and [93melemental[0m [93manalysis[0m. Only [93mone[0m [93mSiMe[0m [93m3[0m [93msignal[0m was [93mobserved[0m in the [93m29[0m [93mSi[0m [93mssNMR[0m [93mspectra[0m of [93m1[0m-[93mM[0m , while [93mtwo[0m [93mSiMe[0m [93m3[0m [93msignals[0m were [93mseen[0m in [93msolution[0m [93m29[0m [93mSi[0m [93mNMR[0m [93mspectra[0m of [93m1[0m-[93mLa[0m and [93m1[0m-[93mCe[0m . This is [93mattributed[0m to [93mdynamic[0m [93maveraging[0m of the [93mSiMe[0m [93m3[0m [93mgroups[0m in [93m1[0m-[93mM[0m in the [93msolid[0m [93mstate[0m [93mdue[0m to [93mfree[0m [93mrotation[0m of the [93mM[0m-[93mSi[0m [93mbonds[0m and [93mdissociation[0m of [93mTHF[0m from [93m1[0m-[93mM[0m in [93msolution[0m to [93mgive[0m the [93mlocally[0m [93mC[0m [93m3[0m [93mv[0m -[93msymmetric[0m [93mcomplexes[0m [[93mM[0m{[93mSi[0m([93mSiMe[0m [93m3[0m ) [93m3[0m } [93m3[0m ([93mTHF[0m) [93mn[0m ] ( [93mn[0m = [93m0[0m or [93m1[0m), which [93mshow[0m [93mrestricted[0m [93mrotation[0m of [93mM[0m-[93mSi[0m [93mbonds[0m on the [93mNMR[0m [93mtime[0m [93mscale[0m. [93mDensity[0m [93mfunctional[0m [93mtheory[0m and [93mcomplete[0m [93mactive[0m [93mspace[0m [93mself[0m-[93mconsistent[0m [93mfield[0m [93mspin[0m-[93morbit[0m [93mcalculations[0m were [93mperformed[0m on [93m1[0m-[93mM[0m and [93mdesolvated[0m [93msolution[0m [93mspecies[0m to [92mmodel[0m [93mparamagnetic[0m [93mNMR[0m [93mshifts[0m. [93mWe[0m [93mfind[0m [93mexcellent[0m [93magreement[0m of [93mexperimental[0m [93m29[0m [93mSi[0m [93mNMR[0m [93mdata[0m for [93mdiamagnetic[0m [93m1[0m-[93mLa[0m , [93msuggesting[0m [93mn[0m = [93m1[0m in [93msolution[0m and [93mreasonable[0m [93magreement[0m of [93mcalculated[0m [93mparamagnetic[0m [93mshifts[0m of [93mSiMe[0m [93m3[0m [93mgroups[0m for [93m1[0m-[93mM[0m ([93mM[0m = [93mPr[0m and [93mNd[0m); the [93mNMR[0m [93mshifts[0m for [93mmetal[0m-[93mbound[0m [93m29[0m [93mSi[0m [93mnuclei[0m [93mcould[0m only be [93mreproduced[0m for [93mdiamagnetic[0m [93m1[0m-[93mLa[0m , [93mshowing[0m the [93mcurrent[0m [93mlimitations[0m of [93mpNMR[0m [93mcalculations[0m for [93mlarger[0m [93mnuclei[0m.
- [93mHydrogen[0m [93mbonding[0m in [93mmicro[0m-[93mphase[0m [93mseparation[0m of [93mpoly[0m([93mpolyamide[0m [93m12[0m-[93mblock[0m-[93mpolytetrahydrofuran[0m) [93malternating[0m [93mblock[0m [93mcopolymer[0m: [93mEnthalpies[0m and [93mmolecular[0m [93mmovements[0m
- [93mHighly[0m [93mefficient[0m [93mlanthanum[0m- and [93mactinium[0m-[93mdoped[0m [93mB6[0m/[93mB8[0m [93mcomplexes[0m as [93msingle[0m-[93matom[0m [93mcatalysts[0m [93mtoward[0m [93msuperior[0m [93mhydrogen[0m [93mevolution[0m [93mreaction[0m: a [93mDFT[0m [93mperspective[0m.: [93mContext[0m: [93mRapid[0m [93mescalating[0m [93menergy[0m [93mdemand[0m and the [93msignificant[0m [93menvironmental[0m [93mimpact[0m of [93mconventional[0m [93menergy[0m [94msources[0m [93mhas[0m [93mintensified[0m the [93msearch[0m for [93msustainable[0m [93malternatives[0m. [93mHydrogen[0m [93mevolution[0m [93mreaction[0m ([93mHER[0m) [93mstands[0m out as a [93mpromising[0m [93mgreen[0m [93menergy[0m [93msolution[0m; [93mhowever[0m, its [93madvancement[0m is [93mrestricted[0m by [93mhigher[0m [93mkinetics[0m and [93mlimited[0m [93mthermal[0m [93mfeasibility[0m, [93mnecessitating[0m the [93mdevelopment[0m of [93mhighly[0m [93mactive[0m [93mcatalytic[0m [93msites[0m. [93mAlthough[0m [93md[0m-[93mblock[0m [93mtransition[0m [93mmetals[0m [93mdominate[0m [93mcurrent[0m [93mHER[0m [93mcatalysis[0m [93mresearch[0m, this [93mstudy[0m [95mexplores[0m for the [93mfirst[0m [93mtime[0m, [93mpotential[0m of [93mf[0m-[93mblock[0m [93melements[0m [93msuch[0m as [93mlanthanum[0m ([93mLa[0m)- and [93mactinium[0m ([93mAc[0m)-[93mdoped[0m [93mboron[0m [93mnano[0m-[93mrings[0m ([93mB6[0m and [93mB8[0m) as [93msingle[0m-[93matom[0m [93mcatalysts[0m ([93mSACs[0m) for [93mHER[0m [93mapplications[0m. [93mMethod[0m: The [93mcatalytic[0m [93mperformance[0m of the [93mdesigned[0m [93mSACs[0m is [93msystematically[0m [95minvestigated[0m [93musing[0m [93mdensity[0m [93mfunctional[0m [93mtheory[0m ([93mDFT[0m) [93mcalculations[0m. The [93mPBE0[0m [93mfunctional[0m with the [93mPople[0m [93m6[0m-[93m31[0m + [93mG[0m([93md[0m,[93mp[0m) [93mbasis[0m [93mset[0m is [93memployed[0m to [93mdescribe[0m the [93mstructural[0m and [93melectronic[0m [93mproperties[0m of [93mall[0m [93mcomplexes[0m. [93mAdsorption[0m [93menergy[0m [93mcalculations[0m [93mrevealed[0m [93mvalues[0m [93mranging[0m from - [93m4[0m.[93m82[0m to - [93m14[0m.[93m66[0m [93mkcal[0m/[93mmol[0m, [93mindicating[0m [93mremarkable[0m [93mthermal[0m [93mstability[0m of the [93mnewly[0m [93mproposed[0m [93mSACs[0m. [93mNatural[0m [93mbond[0m [93morbital[0m ([93mNBO[0m) [93manalysis[0m [93mdemonstrated[0m [93msignificant[0m [93mcharge[0m [93mtransfer[0m from the [93mincorporated[0m [93mLa[0m and [93mAc[0m [93matoms[0m to the [93mboron[0m [93mnano[0m-[93mrings[0m, [93mconfirming[0m [93mstrong[0m [93mtransition[0m [93mmetal[0m-[93msupport[0m [93minteractions[0m. [93mFurthermore[0m, a [93msubstantial[0m [91mchange[0m in the [93mHOMO[0m-[93mLUMO[0m [93menergy[0m [93mgap[0m of [93mB6[0m and [93mB8[0m [93mrings[0m [93mupon[0m [93mdoping[0m [93mhighlighted[0m a [93mpronounced[0m [93mmodulation[0m of [93mtheir[0m [93melectronic[0m and [93mconductive[0m [93mcharacteristics[0m. [93mNotably[0m, the [93mGibbs[0m [93mfree[0m [93menergy[0m [91mchange[0m [93massociated[0m with [93mhydrogen[0m [93madsorption[0m on the [93mM[0m-[93mB8[0m ([93mM[0m = [93mLa[0m and [93mAc[0m) [93mcomplex[0m in [93mgas[0m [93mphase[0m ([93m0[0m.[93m34[0m and - [93m0[0m.[93m34[0m [93meV[0m) [93midentified[0m as [93mexcellent[0m [93msingle[0m-[93matom[0m [93mcatalyst[0m [93mcandidates[0m for the [93mhydrogen[0m [93mevolution[0m [93mreaction[0m. This [93mstudy[0m [93msets[0m a [93mnew[0m [93mbenchmark[0m in [93mcatalyst[0m [92mdesigning[0m by [93mcombining[0m [93mthermal[0m [93mstability[0m and [93moptimal[0m [93menergetics[0m, which [93mcould[0m [93mrevolutionize[0m [93mhydrogen[0m [93mevolution[0m [93mtechniques[0m for [93mclean[0m [93menergy[0m [93mapplications[0m.
- [93mStimuli[0m-[93mresponsive[0m [93mphotoswitch[0m-[93mactinide[0m [93mbinding[0m: a [93mmatch[0m [93mmade[0m in [93mMOFs[0m.: The [93mfundamentals[0m of [93mswitchable[0m [93mactinide[0m-[93mligand[0m [93mbinding[0m [93mmodes[0m are [93mcentral[0m for [92mdesigning[0m [93mnew[0m [92mplatforms[0m for [93maddressing[0m [93mchallenges[0m [93massociated[0m with, for [93mexample[0m, [93misolation[0m of [93mpure[0m [93mradiological[0m [93mdaughters[0m for [93mnuclear[0m [93mmedicine[0m or [93mmethods[0m for [93mefficient[0m [93mnuclear[0m [93mstockpile[0m [93mrecycling[0m. This [93mstudy[0m is the [93mfirst[0m to [93mreport[0m [93mactinide[0m [93mbinding[0m [93mmodes[0m [93mcontrolled[0m by an [93mexternal[0m [93mstimulus[0m [93mvia[0m [93mphotochromic[0m [93mmoieties[0m, [93mrealized[0m through [93mprobing[0m [93mthermodynamics[0m and [93mkinetics[0m [93maspects[0m, [93mincluding[0m [91mchanges[0m in [93mphotoswitch[0m [93misomerization[0m [93mconstants[0m [93mupon[0m [93mmetal[0m [93mcoordination[0m and [93menthalpies[0m [93massociated[0m with the [93msynergistic[0m [93mactinide[0m-[93mswitch[0m [93mphotochromic[0m [93mprocesses[0m. A [93mcomprehensive[0m [93manalysis[0m of the [93mpresented[0m [93mconcept[0m was [93mexecuted[0m through [93mevaluation[0m of [93mdata[0m [93macquired[0m through a [93mmultivariate[0m [93mstrategy[0m [93minvolving[0m [93misothermal[0m [93mtitration[0m [93mcalorimetry[0m, [93mcrystallography[0m, [93mspectroscopy[0m, and [93mtheoretical[0m [92mmodeling[0m on the [93mexample[0m of [93mactinide[0m-[93mcontaining[0m [93mcompounds[0m [93mbased[0m on [93mthorium[0m([93miv[0m)-, and [93muranium[0m([93miv[0m, [93mvi[0m), as [93mwell[0m as [93mtransuranic[0m [93melements[0m [93msuch[0m as [93mplutonium[0m([93miv[0m) in [93msolution[0m and within a [93mmetal[0m-[93morganic[0m [92mframework[0m ([93mMOF[0m) [93mmatrix[0m for the [93mfirst[0m [93mtime[0m. [93mOverall[0m, the [93mpresented[0m [93mconcept[0m [93mcould[0m [93musher[0m in an [93malternative[0m [93mdirection[0m in [93mstimuli[0m-[93mresponsive[0m [93mactinide[0m-[93mbased[0m [92mplatforms[0m that [93mcould[0m be [93madapted[0m to [93mconfront[0m [93mcurrent[0m and [93mupcoming[0m [93mchallenges[0m in [93mf[0m-[93mblock[0m [93mchemistry[0m.
- [93mElectronic[0m [93menergy[0m [93mlevels[0m and [93moptical[0m [93mspectra[0m of [93mtrivalent[0m [93mlanthanide[0m [93mions[0m in [93mwater[0m - [93mCe[0m([93mIII[0m), [93mPr[0m([93mIII[0m), [93mNd[0m([93mIII[0m), [93mSm[0m([93mIII[0m), [93mEu[0m([93mIII[0m), [93mGd[0m([93mIII[0m), [93mTb[0m([93mIII[0m), [93mDy[0m([93mIII[0m), [93mHo[0m([93mIII[0m), [93mEr[0m([93mIII[0m), [93mTm[0m([93mIII[0m), and [93mYb[0m([93mIII[0m).: [93mChemistry[0m is-in [93messence[0m-[93mour[0m [93mcollective[0m [93munderstanding[0m and [93mlanguage[0m [93mdescribing[0m the [93melectronic[0m [93mstructure[0m of [93meach[0m [93melement[0m in the [93mperiodic[0m [93mtable[0m. For the [93mf[0m-[93mblock[0m [93mions[0m, [93mDieke[0m [93mdiagrams[0m [93mhave[0m [93mformed[0m the [93mbasis[0m when [93mdescribing[0m [93melectronic[0m [93mstructure[0m. [93mDieke[0m [93mreported[0m [93mnumerical[0m [93mvalues[0m of the [93melectronic[0m [93menergy[0m [93mlevels[0m in [93mhis[0m [93mbook[0m from [93m1968[0m, and [93mCarnall[0m [93mreported[0m [93mmultiplet[0m [93menergies[0m for the [93mlanthanide[0m([93mIII[0m) [93mions[0m in [93mwater[0m in a [93mseries[0m of [93mpapers[0m from the [93msame[0m [93myear[0m. The [93mexperimental[0m [93mmethods[0m [93mhave[0m [93mimproved[0m since, and in this [93mwork[0m, [93mwe[0m [93mpresent[0m a [93mnew[0m [93mDieke[0m [93mdiagram[0m for the [93mtrivalent[0m [93mlanthanide[0m [93mions[0m in [93mwater[0m. With [93moptical[0m [93mspectroscopy[0m, in [93mparticular[0m [93mluminescence[0m [93mspectroscopy[0m at [93mcryogenic[0m [93mtemperatures[0m, the [93melectronic[0m [93menergy[0m [93mlevels[0m are [93mdetermined[0m [93musing[0m [93mfitting[0m, and [93mseveral[0m [93mlevels[0m [93mreported[0m by [93mDieke[0m and [93mCarnall[0m are [93mfound[0m to be [93martifacts[0m. [93mFurther[0m, the [93mnew[0m [93mmethods[0m [93mallow[0m [93mboth[0m [93mdetermination[0m of [93mspeciation[0m and [93mdescription[0m of [93melectronics[0m [93mstates[0m and [93mlines[0m.
